name: Thursir
description: A large giant with a hefty frame and a menacing presence, wearing a chain shirt.
memorable: The Thursir has potent melee capabilities and can invoke fear with lightning-infused attacks.
goals: Typically seeks confrontation and domination over weaker creatures.
relations: Could be encountered alongside other giants or as a mercenary for evil-aligned forces.
environment: Commonly found in mountainous regions or dark, secluded areas.
strengths: High strength and constitution make it tough in battle, paired with exceptional melee damage potential.
weaknesses: Lack of agility and lower dexterity creates vulnerabilities to strategic combat tactics.
attacks: Wields a Warhammer for devastating melee strikes and can throw rocks for ranged assault.
most_powerful_ability: Runic Blood allows it to enhance weapon strikes with extra lightning damage and control reactions.
senses: Possesses darkvision, allowing it to see in dim light within 60 feet.
skills: Proficient in Athletics and has good perception, reflecting its awareness and strength.
additional_information: Advantage on saving throws against poison due to Cast Iron Stomach ability.
Can inscribe runes in its blood to enhance weapon attacks.
Has a good saving throw bonus against Constitution effects.
Able to deliver impactful melee and ranged attacks.
Presence is often intimidating to lesser creatures.
